TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CspKeyContainerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关加密密钥对的附加信息。

span.span: Provides additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类以获取有关密钥对，如密钥容器名称或键数的其他信息。Use this class to obtain additional information about a key pair, such as the key container name or the key number. 在其中由生成的随机密钥的情况下或，直到调用使用的密钥的方法，将不会创建一个密钥容器。In cases where a random key is generated by the or the , a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key. 某些属性类将引发如果尚未创建的密钥容器。Some properties of the class will throw a if a key container has not been created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器并检索有关该容器的信息。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CryptoKeySecurity As CryptoKeySecurity

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象表示容器的访问权限和审核规则。

span.span: Gets a object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.

value.span: 表示容器访问权限及审核规则的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来检索对象，用于管理创建的自定义访问控制列表 (DACL) 和系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 容器。Use the property to retrieve the object that manages the creation of discretionary access control lists (DACLS) and system access control lists (SACLS) for a container.

span.span: The key type is not supported.

exception.span: 无法找到加密服务提供程序。

span.span: The cryptographic service provider cannot be found.
-or-
The key container was not found.

permission.span: 用于更改和查看的访问控制列表与此密钥容器相关联。

span.span: for changing and viewing the access control list associated with this key container.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyNumber As KeyNumber
public: property System::Security::Cryptography::KeyNumber KeyNumber { System::Security::Cryptography::KeyNumber get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值描述非对称密钥是否被创建为签名密钥或交换密钥。

span.span: Gets a value that describes whether an asymmetric key was created as a signature key or an exchange key.

value.span: 值之一，该值描述非对称密钥是否被创建为签名密钥或交换密钥。

span.span: One of the values that describes whether an asymmetric key was created as a signature key or an exchange key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性派生自字段对象，用于初始化对象。The value of the property is derived from the field of the object that was used to initialize the object. 交换密钥是用于加密会话密钥，以便它们可以安全地存储以及与其他用户交换的非对称密钥对。An exchange key is an asymmetric key pair used to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 值指定交换密钥。The value specifies an exchange key. 此值对应于`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`使用非托管在 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 签名密钥是用于进行身份验证 （进行数字签名） 的消息或文件的非对称密钥对。A signature key is an asymmetric key pair used for authenticating (digitally signed) messages or files. 值指定的签名密钥。The value specifies a signature key. 此值对应于`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中使用的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器并检索有关该容器的信息。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderName As String
public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取密钥的提供程序名称。

span.span: Gets the provider name of a key.
The provider name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定创建密钥的加密服务提供程序。This property specifies the cryptographic service provider that created the key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器并检索有关该容器的信息。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderType As Integer
public: property int ProviderType { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取密钥的提供程序类型。

span.span: Gets the provider type of a key.
The provider type.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用要创建密钥的加密服务提供程序确定有效的值。Valid values are determined by the cryptographic service provider used to create the key. 加密服务提供程序通常被组织到组或系列，其中每个有其自己的数据格式和进程集。Cryptographic service providers are generally organized into groups or families, each of which has its own set of data formats and processes. 两个系列，使用相同的算法，如 RC2 块加密法，通常使用不同的填充方案、 不同的密钥长度和不同的默认模式。Two families that use the same algorithm, such as the RC2 block cipher, often use different padding schemes, different key lengths, and different default modes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器并检索有关该容器的信息。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

public: property bool RandomlyGenerated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示某个密钥容器是否由托管加密类随机生成。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a key container was randomly generated by a managed cryptography class.

value.span: 如果该密钥容器是随机生成的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key container was randomly generated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，创建随机生成的密钥容器时，密钥容器名为"CLR {`guid value`}。"Usually, when a randomly generated key container is created, the key container is named "CLR{`guid value`}." ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器并检索有关该容器的信息。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container.
